VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Academy}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverhaven Polytechnic}.

MSR.A: {Meridian Academy} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Silverhaven Polytechnic, Celestial College, Aethelgard School of Arts, Borealis Graduate School, Zenith Institute of Technology, Meridian Academy}.
